sentence.Network_en: A white cane sofa is sumptuously upholstered in gold taffeta and purple velvet.
sentence.Network_cn: 白藤沙发上配有金色塔夫绸和紫色天鹅绒制成的沙发垫，显得豪华而精致。

sentence.Network_en: This government building is sumptuously appointed.
sentence.Network_cn: 这座政府办公大楼布置得极为豪华.

entry.def: Something that is sumptuous is grand and obviously very expensive.

example.ex: She produces elegant wedding gowns in a variety of sumptuous fabrics.
example.tran: 她用各种华贵的布料制作高雅的婚纱。

means.word_mean: 1. in a sumptuous and opulent manner;

auth_sentence.content: This is the heavy hitter of the half-term releases: sumptuously and expensively animated down to the last ruffled feather.

auth_sentence.content: Send me a little pot of cheese, he once wrote to a friend, that, when I like, I may fare sumptuously.
